descriptors.name: connect_bt_dmp_soc_empty
descriptors.label: Connect Bluetooth DMP - SoC Empty
descriptors.description: The Connect Empty DMP (Dynamic Multiprotocol) example serves as an RTOS-based project, providing a foundational skeleton for Connect. While it lacks additional functions beyond the basic framework, it does incorporate a BLE Task featuring a straightforward command line interface (CLI). Developers can build upon this groundwork to create more robust and feature-rich applications.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_direct_mode_device
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC Direct Mode Device
descriptors.description: The provided sample application facilitates direct commissioning of nodes and enables seamless data exchange between them through command line interface (CLI) commands. Developers can utilize this functionality to streamline communication and enhance interoperability within their networked systems.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_ecdh_key_exchange
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC ECDH Key Exchange
descriptors.description: This sample application demonstrates how to securely share a network key among multiple devices using the Elliptic-curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key agreement protocol. By employing ECDH, two parties can establish a shared secret over an insecure channel, which can then be used as a symmetric encryption key for secure communication.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_empty
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC Empty
descriptors.description: The Connect Empty project serves as a foundational Connect application, stripped down to its essential elements. It provides a clean slate for building customized, proprietary solutions with a streamlined approach.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_mac_mode_device
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC MAC Mode Device
descriptors.description: This sample application offers a command-line interface (CLI) that facilitates network formation and joining. Users can create new networks or connect to existing ones. Additionally, the app enables data transmission between nodes using either short or long addresses.

descriptors.name: connect_bt_dmp_soc_light
descriptors.label: Connect Bluetooth DMP - SoC Light
descriptors.description: The purpose of this application is to demonstrate simple wireless communication between two or more boards using the Connect SDK. When combined with the Connect-Switch sample application, it creates basic light functionality, allowing the LEDs to be toggled on the Light node. Upon power-up, the Light (acting as the network coordinator) creates its own local network. The Switch modules (low-power end-nodes) can then join this network and control the Light node. If a local network is established using the “form” CLI command, the Switch nodes can join using the “join” CLI command. From that point onward, the Light can be controlled by pressing the PB1 button on any connected Switch node.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_switch
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC Switch
descriptors.description: The purpose of this application is to demonstrate simple wireless communication between two or more boards using the Connect SDK. When combined with the Connect Light DMP sample application, it creates basic switch functionality. In this setup, the LEDs can be toggled on the Light node. Upon power-up, the Light (acting as the network coordinator) creates its own local network. The Switch modules (low-power end-nodes) can then join this network and control the Light node. If a local network is established using the CLI command, the Switch nodes can join using the “join” CLI command. From that point onward, the Light can be controlled by pressing the PB1 button on any connected Switch node.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_sensor
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC Sensor
descriptors.description: This demonstration illustrates the proper setup of a star network topology, enabling bidirectional communication between the Sink and Sensor nodes. The PB0 pushbutton serves to enable or disable sleep mode, in conjunction with adjusting the VCOM option for 'reception while sleeping'.

descriptors.name: connect_soc_sink
descriptors.label: Connect - SoC Sink
descriptors.description: The Sink example serves as the counterpart to the Sensor example. It receives reports from Sensor nodes as they join its network.
